title.narrative: 2016 LK014 Facilitating Children to Create a World Where They can Enjoy their Rights.

description.narrative:
Project Goal

Ensuring children that they have a world which fit for enjoying their rights

Specific Objective:

To strengthen community based structures and government bodies to realise child rights in selected geographical areas

Proposed Activities:

The activities will achieve the specific objective in 3 months as follows:

(a) Care & Protection:

· Baseline data collection on key child protection indicators in targeted 10 locations.

· Formation or revitalization of community based structures (Children clubs, youth groups and Village Child Rights Monitoring Committee - VCRMC) in targeted 10 locations.

· Awareness on child rights and protection through forum theatre performance – 4 performances.

· Provision of Play and Recreational items to promote children and youth to have the access of community based structures and registering children clubs.

· Assisting or referring for psychosocial support.

· Referral and linkage with other service providers for livelihoods activities, education, health & nutrition and Water & Sanitation.

(b) Education:

· Provision of learning kits to number of vulnerable children in targeted 10 locations to ensure the access to schools.

· Providing library facilities in targeted 4 locations.

· Organizing English learning classes in targeted 5 locations.

(c) Child Rights Governance:

· Discussion with key Government officials regarding the project activities and coordination.

· Discussion with Community based organization regarding the project activities.

· Training of community structures on basic helping skills, child participation -10 Nos.

· Training on general child protection, legislations on child protections, reporting and referral system for divisional Child Protection Committees and key Government officials- 2 days 2 trainings.

· Publication materials for making awareness on child rights and governance.
